cookie.description: We use essential cookies to make our site work. With your consent. we may also use non-essential cookies to improve user experience and analyze website traffic. By clicking "Accept" you agree to our website's cookie use as described in our cookie policy.

banner.subtext: Welcome to ReHome, your premier destination for finding houses and apartments in Ghana. As an MLS platform, we provide a comprehensive database of property listings, whether you're looking to buy, rent, or find a short-term let. We are here to assist you every step of the way. Trust ReHome to seamlessly guide you towards your dream property in Ghana.

service1.title:
Property
Management
service1.note: Enjoy stress-free property management services from our exclusive list of experienced professionals.

service2.title:
Mortgage
Assistance
service2.note: Get all the mortgage assistance you need to start your home acquisition journey.

service3.title:
Consulting
Services
service3.note: Invest in success with our real estate consulting services.

service4.title:
Home
Buying/Selling
service4.note: Home buying or selling doesn't have to be a complex process - get expert advice today!

moreofyou.title: MORE OF YOU, LESS OF US
moreofyou.note: At ReHome, we have a defining culture of doing much more than just selling real estate. As a top home selling and renting organization, we share the culture of serving each other, our communities and our planet. Our mission, vision, values and culture differentiate us as industry innovators and leaders.

ceomessage.note: I honestly believe that the number one thing we can do to improve neighborhoods, communities and individuals is help people own a home.

authpage.title: Premium Experience
authpage.subtext:
Seamless experience whiles finding the next big thing,
your own property. It’s easy, fast and affordable

publishdialog.title: Property Upload Agreement
publishdialog.note: By uploading properties on ReHome, I confirm that I have read and adhered to the rules and guidelines. I guarantee the accuracy of information, high-quality images, compliance with legal requirements, and respect for intellectual property. I understand that ReHome reserves the right to review and moderate listings. Any violation may lead to property removal, account suspension or termination.
publishdialog.toread: to read the Rules for Uploading Properties.

promotion.title: Why Promote?
promotion.paragraph1: At ReHome, we understand that as a real estate broker, your time is valuable and you want to get the most out of your marketing efforts. That's why we offer the option to promoted your listings on our website. When you pay to promote a listing, it will be featured prominently on our site, increasing the visibility of your property to potential buyers.
promotion.paragraph2: This can lead to a faster sale and ultimately save you time and efforts in the long run. Plus, with our targeted advertising algorithms, you can be confident that your property is being seen by the right audience. Investing in the promotion of your listing on ReHome is a smart move that can pay off in the end.

agentlight.note: The Free Plan is ideal for customers just starting out. This Plan provides customers with basic marketing tools for property visibility and leads generation.

agentplus.note: The Broker Plan is ideal for customers with up to 5 properties. This Plan provides customers with enhanced marketing tools for higher property visibility and leads generation.

realtor.title: Realtor
realtor.note: The Realtor Plan is highly recommended for customers with unlimited properties. This Plan provides customers with all requisite marketing tools to maximize visibility and leads generation.

developer.title: Developer

sidenote.note: We are pleased you decided to join us and we hope you make the most out of all the tools we have curated for you to maximise profit on ReHome.com

tab1.nardisclaimer: Disclaimer: Without your National Association of Realtors number, you will be listed as a Broker

tab4.title: Welcome Aboard!
tab4.note: Click finish to go to your Dashboard and begin uploading your first property

tab1.title: Is ReHome a real estate agency?
tab1.note: No, ReHome is a real estate platform dedicated to helping buyers and sellers connect for mutually beneficial transactions.

tab2.title: Are the brokers on this platform verified?
tab2.note: Yes, ReHome verifies all brokers on its platform by requiring  documents relating to their profession before their properties are listed on the website.

tab3.title: Does ReHome provide mortgage services?
tab3.note: ReHome does not provide mortgage financing directly. However, we offer support services to help you secure mortgage financing in Ghana.

tab4.title: How do I make comparisons between properties that I am interested in?
tab4.note: You can make comparisons between properties that you are interested in by using our wishlist feature. This feature allows you to save your favorite properties so that you can compare the properties' features to help you make a decision. To save a property to your wishlist, simply click on the "Save" button when viewing a property's details on our website. You can then view your saved properties by navigating to the "Wishlist" section on your account dashboard.

appealforfraud.title: Appeal for Fraud
appealforfraud.note1: If you have reason to believe someone has posted a property that belongs to you on this platform. Please send an email to appeals@rehomeafrica.com containing the link to the property and the relevant documents that show you, in fact, have the rights to this property
appealforfraud.note2:
• Log into your account on our website or create an account if you do not have one.
  • Find the property or broker that you believe is fraudulent and click on the "Report" button.
  • Fill out the form provided with as much information as possible about the issue, including any evidence of fraud that you have.
  • Submit the form and wait for a response from our team.
appealforfraud.note3: Please note that it is important to provide as much detail as possible, including any evidence or documentation, to help us investigate the issue. We take all reports of fraud seriously and will investigate the matter promptly.
appealforfraud.note4: Alternatively, you can contact us through our customer support service or email us at info@rehomeafrica.com to report your incident.
appealforfraud.note5: We appreciate your help in keeping our platform safe and trustworthy for all users.

accountverification.title: Account Verification
accountverification.note1: As a real estate broker, it is important to further verify your account on ReHome to ensure the accuracy and authenticity of the information on your profile. This process will take a minimum of one week to complete as it requires manual review by our team. If you have signed up and it has been longer than a week since you submitted your verification request, you can send an email to appeals@rehomeafrica.com for further assistance.
accountverification.note2: By verifying your account, you are helping to maintain the integrity and credibility of the ReHome platform. Having a fully verified account on ReHome can benefit you in several ways. It can increase the trust and confidence of potential clients and help you stand out in a crowded market. It can also provide you with access to exclusive features and resources on the platform that may not be available to unverified users. By verifying your account, you can enhance your professional reputation and make the most of your presence on the ReHome platform.

banner.subtext: Open your doors to new business possibilities and connect with house hunters in Ghana, USA, UK, France and Netherlands.
banner.question: Are you a Broker, Realtor, or Developer?

section2.title: Why you should sell on ReHome?
section2.note: Our unique marketing approach ensures that your listed properties are visible to prospective buyers in Accra, Tema, and other locations in Ghana. You are one step closer to making a sale when you list your properties on ReHome.

marketing.title: Marketing Your Property
marketing.note: Our ReHome brokers have access to advanced technology and marketing strategies, and have the knowledge and expertise to help sell your home. A few highlights include:

grid1.title: Online Listing for Your Home
grid1.note: Online listings feature information specific to each property and the surrounding area, as well as a property image. An invaluable marketing tool, the property image gives potential buyers an instant preview, which saves time and visually sparks interest.

grid2.title: Mobile Presence
grid2.note: Prospective buyers will be able to access the same great search technology available on our website while on the go! Our home search app is available for both iOS and Android devices, increasing the opportunity for your home to be shown to potential buyers anywhere and at any time.

grid3.title: Advanced Marketing
grid3.note: We have advanced marketing and digital strategies that can help drive more traffic to your listing. The ReHome network of brokers is one of the largest in the country and can be a great resource for spreading the word about your property by word of mouth, online marketing, and other advertising opportunities.

testimonials.title: Testomonials
testimonials.testimony: In promotion and advertising, a testimonial or show consists of a person's written or spoken statement extolling the virtue of a product. The term “testimonial” most commonly applies to the sales-pitches attributed to ordinary citizens, whereas the word “endorsement” usually applies to pitches by celebrities

singleagent.completeprofile: Complete your profile to enable you contact a broker

agent.title: Broker/Realtor/Developer
agent.note: We're here to help you succeed in real estate. From finding leads to closing deals, our platform provides the tools you need to streamline your workflow and connect with motivated buyers and sellers. Check out the FAQs section below for more details and answers to frequently asked questions.

q1.title: How do I list my properties on the website?
q1.answer: To list your properties on the website, you have to first create an account. To do that, navigate to the menu bar and click the “Sign Up” button. Choose the appropriate user type and create an account with your email address.

q2.title: What types of properties can I list on your website?
q2.answer: Our platform is dedicated to residential real estate and allows you to list houses, apartments, off-plan units, and lands.

q3.title: How can I manage my listings on your website?
q3.answer: You can manage your listings by creating an account and accessing the dashboard, where you can add, edit, archive, or remove listings as needed.

q4.title: How can I get more visibility for my listings on your website?
q4.answer: You can get more visibility for your listings by optimizing them with accurate and detailed information, including high-quality photos. You can also promote your listings for higher visibility.

q5.title: How can I  promote my listings for higher visibility?
q5.answer: You can get more visibility by promoting your listings via your ReHome account. Simply sign in to your account and navigate to “listings”. Select the listing(s) you would like to enhance visibility for and click the “Promote Selected” button. A prompt will pop up with a list of promotion options to choose from. Select the preferred option and click the “View Cart” button. You will be redirected to a payment page to complete the process. You can also consider upgrading your existing subscription for enhanced visibility.

q6.title: What is the cost of listing my properties on your website?
q6.answer: We offer different subscription packages with varying features and prices. For instance, the Broker Light Plan is ideal for customers with up to five property listings. The Broker Plus Plan is ideal for customers with up to 20 property listings. The Realtor Plan offers customers unlimited property listings while the Developer Plan is ideal for real estate developers looking to promote their development projects for optimum results.

q7.title: Can I receive notifications when a potential buyer or tenant contacts me about my listing?
q7.answer: Yes, you will receive a lead record which will automatically trigger an in-app notification and email notification.

q8.title: How can I track the performance of my listings on your website?
q8.answer: You can track the performance of your listings by accessing the stats dashboard, where you can view metrics such as clicks, reach and leads.

q9.title: How can I access leads generated from my listings on your website?
q9.answer: You can access all leads generated on ReHome from your stats page. The leads will also show up in the inbox of the email address connected to your ReHome account.

seekers.title: Home Seekers
seekers.note: Welcome, home seekers! Find your dream home with our platform's advanced search features and comprehensive listings. Our knowledgeable staff can guide you through the process, and our intuitive platform makes it easy to save your favorite listings and get new property alerts. Check out our FAQs below.

q1.title: How do I search for properties on the website?
q1.answer: To search for properties on the website, you can use the search bar to type in your preferred location. You can additionally refine your search by transaction type, property type, budget, number of bedrooms, sort query and more. You can also use the map feature to search for properties in a specific area.

q2.title: What are the types of properties available on the website?
q2.answer: The website has a variety of residential properties that include detached and semi-detached houses, apartments, townhomes and lands.

q3.title: Do you own any of the properties on the website?
q3.answer: No, we don't. We are a real estate hub that connects property seekers with owners and brokers. Our website serves as a platform for property owners and brokers to list their properties, while prospective buyers or renters can browse the listings and contact the owners or brokers directly.

q4.title: Is it possible to save a list of my favorite properties on the website?
q4.answer: Yes, it is possible to save a list of your preferred property selections on our website. To do this, simply create a ReHome account and log in. Then, navigate to the property listing you're interested in and click on the "Add to wishlist" button. This will add the property to your saved list, which you can access at any time by clicking on the "[descriptive name]" tab in your account.

q5.title: What are the different payment options available when buying or renting a property?
q5.answer: Payment options may include cash, bank transfer, and sometimes installment plans or mortgages. Payment options may vary depending on the seller or broker.

q6.title: How do I find a broker on the website?
q6.answer: To find a broker on our website, navigate to the menu bar and click on the "Find A Broker" menu. You can browse through our list of verified brokers, view their profiles, and contact your preferred brokers directly.

q7.title: What are the current property prices in Ghana?
q7.answer: Property prices in Ghana vary depending on the location, type, and condition of the property. You can browse the website to get an idea of current property prices or contact any of our verified brokers for more specific information.

q8.title: How do I contact the seller or broker of a property?
q8.answer: You will be required to log in with the email address you registered with on the ReHome website. First, click the contact icon on the listing page. You will be redirected to the login page to create an account. If you have an existing account, log in with your credentials. The contact details will appear once this has been completed.

q9.title: Will I be charged a fee for creating a ReHome account?
q9.answer: No. Account registrations for individuals are absolutely free!

q10.title: Do you provide real estate support services?
q10.answer: Yes, we offer a range of real estate support services at a fee. Our services include property management, professional photography and videography, virtual tours, home staging services, interior design, property advisory services, etc.

q11.title: Do you provide mortgage financing?
q11.answer: No, we don't. However, we have a list of recommended mortgage partners who can provide mortgage financing to qualified buyers. We also offer mortgage support services at a fee to help you get through the mortgage application process. Please note that any mortgage financing obtained through our website would be through third-party partners and not directly from us.

q12.title: What mortgage support services do you provide?
q12.answer: We offer a range of mortgage support services to assist applicants through the mortgage process, including pre-qualification assistance, application assistance, mortgage rate comparison, closing coordination, and refinancing support. Please note that these services are offered at a fee.

q13.title: Do you have an app on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store?
q13.answer: No, we do not have a mobile app available at this time.

q14.title: How can I report suspicious or fraudulent activity on your website?
q14.answer: You can report suspicious or fraudulent activity by contacting our customer support team immediately. We take all reports seriously and investigate any suspected fraudulent activity.

q15.title: What documents do I need to buy or rent a property in Ghana?
q15.answer: Documents required to buy or rent a property in Ghana may include a valid ID, proof of income, bank statements, and other relevant documentation. It's best to consult with a real estate broker or lawyer for specific details.

q16.title: How do I know if a property is in a good location?
q16.answer: Factors that may indicate a good location include proximity to amenities such as schools, hospitals, shopping centers, and transportation, as well as low crime rates, good infrastructure, and a serene environment.

q17.title: How do I know if a property is available for sale or rent?
q17.answer: All properties on our website are available for sale and rent. Properties that are no longer available are either flagged as such or are taken off the platform entirely. Additionally, you can contact the seller or broker for confirmation.

q18.title: What are the best neighborhoods to live in Accra?
q18.answer: This may depend on personal preferences and needs, but some popular neighborhoods in Ghana include East Legon, Airport Residential Area, Cantonments, and Labone.

owners.title: Home Owners
owners.note: Welcome, homeowners! Use our platform's resources whether you're looking to sell or rent your property. Our team of experienced professionals can help you navigate the market and showcase your property with high-quality photos and descriptions. Check out our FAQs section below for more information.

q1.title: How can I list my property on the website as a private homeowner?
q1.answer: To list your property on our website as a private homeowner, you have to contact any of our verified brokers on the platform to market your property on your behalf. To contact a broker, click the sell button on the menu bar. Navigate to the bottom page and fill out the form. Follow the prompts to the end and select any of our available brokers. Click the save button to complete the process. The broker will contact you as soon as practicable to negotiate transaction terms with you. Once satisfied, they will list your property on ReHome.

q2.title: Can I list my property as an individual for free?
q2.answer: Yes, listing your property as an individual is absolutely free! However, all individual homeowners are required to list their properties through a ReHome-verified broker who may charge a commission.

q3.title: Do you charge any fees for connecting me with a broker?
q3.answer: No, it’s absolutely free! Once you are satisfied with your preferred broker, you are free to negotiate any fees or commissions directly with him/her. Please note that we do not take any responsibility for transactions between an broker and a property owner.

q4.title: Can I still access your website resources as a private homeowner?
q4.answer: Yes, you can still access our website resources, such as property market reports, guides, and blog articles for personal information and research purposes.

videos.v1: Filling out Sell for Private Home Owner
videos.v2: How to contact an Broker for Buyers
videos.v3: Connecting with the buyers for Brokers/Developers
videos.v7: How to Sign-up and Onboard for Broker/Realtor/Developer

banner.title: Real Estate Broker Advertising
banner.note: When you advertise with ReHome, you get access to the largest online real estate network in Ghana and beyond. Start connecting live with active buyers today!

section1.title: Connect to buyers in real-time
section1.note: Looking to maximize your real estate sales? Look no further than connecting with buyers in real-time! With this powerful tool at your disposal, you can engage with potential buyers like never before, providing them with the personalized service and attention they crave.

section2.title: Stremlined Business Management
section2.note: We simplify the home buying process by using technology and expertise to connect home buyers with the right real estate agencies and brokers. Our platform offers easy access to the latest real estate listings, and our team of experienced professionals provides guidance and support every step of the way.

section3.title:
Leads Management and
Performance Tracking
section3.note: Our experienced team can help you streamline your lead management process and track your team's performance to ensure that you are meeting your goals. With our expert guidance and support, you can optimize your lead generation and improve your overall business performance.

section4.title:
Personalised solutions for
Real Estate related business
section4.note: We offer personalized solutions for all your real estate-related needs. Our team of experts has a deep understanding of the industry and can provide you with a range of services, from growing your real estate business to maximizing your returns as an investor. We take the time to understand your unique requirements and develop a customized solution that works best for you.

rulesforuploading.title: Rules for Uploading Properties
rulesforuploading.note1: To ensure a seamless and reliable user experience, we have established certain rules and guidelines for property listings.
rulesforuploading.note2: Here are the rules to follow when uploading properties on our site:
rulesforuploading.p1: 1. Accurate and Complete Information: Provide accurate and up-to-date information about the property, including its location, size, amenities, and pricing. Ensure that all details are presented in a clear and concise manner.
rulesforuploading.p2: 2. High-Quality Images: Upload high-quality images that accurately represent the property. Images should be well-lit, properly framed, and showcase the key features and areas of the property.
rulesforuploading.p3: 3. Property Ownership Verification: Only list properties for which you have legal ownership or proper authorization to represent.
rulesforuploading.p4: 4. Compliance with Legal Requirements: It is your responsibility to confirm that the property meets all necessary legal requirements.
rulesforuploading.p5: 5. Respect for Intellectual Property: Do not upload any content that infringes upon the intellectual property rights of others, including copyrighted materials or trademarks. Obtain proper permissions for any copyrighted content used in the listing.
rulesforuploading.p6: 6. Prohibited Content: Do not include any content that is discriminatory, offensive, illegal, or violates our terms of service. This includes discriminatory language, explicit content, or any other material that may be deemed inappropriate.
rulesforuploading.p7: 7. Timely Updates: Keep your property listings up to date by promptly marking listings that have been sold or are no longer available as such on the platform. Regularly review and update your listings to maintain their accuracy.
rulesforuploading.p8: 8. Professional Conduct: Interact with potential buyers or tenants in a professional and respectful manner. Respond promptly to inquiries and provide accurate information about the listed properties.
rulesforuploading.p9: 9. Failure to comply with these rules may result in the removal of the property listing or other appropriate actions as per our policies.
rulesforuploading.footnote1: If you have any questions or need further clarification on the rules for uploading properties, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at
rulesforuploading.footnote2: We're here to ensure a positive experience for both property listers and users of our platform.

dsar.title: Data Subject Access Request Form
dsar.description: Please fill in the information below. ReHome's administrator will be notified of your request, and will need an appropriate amount of time to respond.

form.name: Your name
form.email: What email address do you use to access the above website / app?
form.submitter: You are submitting this request as
form.submitter_as_person: The person, or the parent / guardian of the person, whose name appears above.
form.submitter_as_entity: A broker authorized by the consumer to make this request on their behalf.
form.law: Under the rights of which law are you making this request?
form.request: I am submitting a request to ___________
form.information_gathering_label: Know what information is being collected from me
form.prevent_thirdparty_data_sales_label: Opt out of having my data sold to third parties
form.accept_data_sales_label: Opt in to the sale of my personal data
form.get_information_label: Receive a copy of my personal information
form.prevent_advertisement_purposes_label: Opt out of having my data shared for cross-context behavioral advertising
form.limit_information_disclosure_label: Limit the use and disclosure of my sensitive personal information
form.other_label: Other (please specify in the comment box below)
form.note: Please leave details regarding your action request or question.
form.note_placeholder: Please leave details regarding your action request or question.
form.accurate_information_confirmations_label: Under penalty of perjury, I declare all the above information to be true and accurate.
form.deletion_risk_confirmations_label: I understand that the deletion or restriction of my personal data is irreversible and may result in the termination of services with ReHome.
form.validation_confirmations_label: I understand that I will be required to validate my request by email, and I may be contacted in order to complete the request.
